name: Thai Pink Milk (Nomyen)
description: Pink Milk is a sweet drink similar to a strawberry milkshake, and made with the famous Hale’s Blue Boy Sala Syrup. Stirred and served in under a minute!

ingredients.ingredient: Hale’s Blue Boy sala flavored syrup

directions: Mix the milk and sala flavored syrup with a spoon in a mixing jug. Taste the milk mixture and adjust the sweetness to your liking by adding more milk or syrup.
Fill 3 cups with crushed ice and pour the pink milk mixture over the ice.
Drizzle some evaporated milk onto the top of each cup and enjoy!
